thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good stay
thread.title_full: Good stay - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew P
title: Good stay
text:
Good service.
Food good.
Very clean and tidy.
Parking expensive £12 a day but and close to ExCel.
Ask for a room away from over head trains as these are very loud if your room is close to them.
Parking expensive £12.00 a day but take credit cards.
The hotel is close to ExCel.
Ask for a room away from over head trains!!!!
You can walk to Curry house just by ExCel and is OK but that's all.
